spoolman.description: Spoolman is a self-hosted Web service and database to manage your 3D printer filament spools. https://github.com/Donkie/Spoolman
spoolman.more_info: This Rock-on uses the official Spoolman Docker image from Docker Hub, a muiltiarch image supporting amd64, arm64, and armhf architectures.
